name: 魏敏樺
objective:
Class Objective目標: 本課程為土木工程之基礎課程，在土木系列為選修科目於下學期教授，目的在使學生能夠了解如何將工程應用上之實例包含土木，振動工程，材料力學，控制工程，等領域以數學，方程式，或模型等方式加以表達並解決相關之問題。內容為：
1.線性聯立微分方程
2.矩正
3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分
4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
This course introduces basic engineering mathematics and how it be applied to solve engineering problems such as mechanics, vibration, and control engineering. Topics include Linear Algebra (Matrices, Determinants, Linear System of Eqns, Matrix Eigenvalue Problems), Vector Analysis, Fourier Analysis and PDE. The objective of the course is to train students to have the capability in applying mathematics in solving engineering problems. In addition to introduction of the method of solving mathematical equations, their physical meaning and the basic idea of these topics will be carefully introduced. etc.
